overview: Jonathan Harris, Sharpcast’s Vice President of Business Development and Sales, is a seasoned rainmaker with over 20 years experience with both high profile technology giants and Silicon Valley start-ups. Most recently, Harris oversaw wireless carrier and retail channels plus channel marketing and customer care for the popular Jawbone Bluetooth headset as VP of Sales at Aliph. During his tenure, revenue grew over 14,000% through partnerships Harris orchestrated with AT&T Mobility, Verizon, Apple, Best Buy, Sprint, T-Mobile, and more. Previously, Harris ran channel sales for the popular ZoneAlarm Internet security software line. Earlier in his career, Harris held a succession of high-profile and notable positions including VP of Sales at Mirra (sold to Seagate), VP of Sales at SonicBlue (where he led WW Sales and channel marketing for ReplayTV & GoVideo Divisions), Director of Channel Sales at Microsoft (responsible for Ultimate TV), VP of Sales at ReplayTV, and Director of North American Sales for Macromedia. Harris graduated from Southern Methodist University.
